entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 14.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny late in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 March 2023
